CatDescriptText: Nettie Saltzer, Box 252, R.D. 2, Coraopolis, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 2, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you believe Negroes, who get public assistance, do more cheating than whites?" answer reads: "I believe whites do the greater amount of cheating."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Nettie Saltzer wearing eyeglasses, dark sheer head scarf, light colored coat, and suit, standing in front of Jenkins Arcade with Thrift Drugs in background, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
